metadata.name: Peacefulness
metadata.description:
Only travelers know what it's like to just sit down by the fire after 20 km of hiking. A complete release of the brain from work and only enjoyment of nature. 

My first work is called "peacefulness".
Crazy views from the drone and the most popular places in Altai.  

From this trip we slept in a tent for 8 days. The temperature was -3 at night and +20 during the day.
We are preparing a full movie from this trip that will go for 5 minutes.

Bonus 
At the end of the main movie we will express a huge thank you to the buyer and add your nickname . As soon as the video is finished we will send you a video of it. Rabo
